data.name: Business Line of Credit - Secured by Residential Property
data.description: Revolving credit facility for business purposes

features.additionalInfo: Receive notification from bank of your nominated transactions (e.g. low account balance warning; credits over $500)

eligibility.additionalInfo: Must be identifiable in terms of legislative requirements. Lending criteria apply.

Account has a Transaction Fee Allowance of $3 per month, plus a Transaction Fee Rebate of $3 per $1,000 Minimum Monthly Balance. E.g. $15 rebate for $5,000 Minimum Monthly Balance, plus $3 Transaction Fee Allowance.  Charity and community based accounts may attract an increased Transaction Fee Allowance of $20 per month.

fees.name: EFTPOS Fee (with or without cash out)

fees.name: Overseas ATM
fees.additionalInfo: $5.00 plus Foreign Currency Conversion Fee

fees.name: Information fee
fees.additionalInfo: $20.00 plus $1.00 per page copied. Payable when we provide information or copies to you or a third party that relates to a Security, dealing document, or any record relating to your Contract or loan account (other than information you are entitled to obtain free of charge under the National Credit Code (where applicable)).

fees.name: Information fee - Per Page
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we provide information or copies to you or a third party that relates to a Security, dealing document, or any record relating to your Contract or loan account (other than information you are entitled to obtain free of charge under the National Credit Code (where applicable)).

fees.name: Bank transfer fee
fees.additionalInfo: When any amount is debited or credited to a bank account in our name as a result of which it is necessary for us to debit or credit monies to your loan

fees.name: Bulk coin purchase fee - In branch
fees.additionalInfo: 2.00% of value (minimum $2.00)

fees.name: Bulk coin purchase fee - External
fees.additionalInfo: $8.00 per bag

fees.name: Foreign currency conversion fee
fees.additionalInfo: 3.00% of the value of the transaction in AUD debited to your account when you make a transaction in a foreign currency or in AUD when you are outside of Australia; or in Australia where the merchant or financial institution that processes the transaction is located outside of Australia

fees.name: Replacement card fee
fees.additionalInfo: Domestic $7.00

fees.name: Replacement card fee
fees.additionalInfo: International $100.00

fees.name: SMS alert fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each SMS alert that is sent to you notifying you of account balances and/or other nominated transactions.

fees.name: Cheque honour fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if we honour a cheque that would otherwise have been dishonoured due to insufficient funds.

fees.name: EFT transaction fee (RTGS)
fees.additionalInfo: Transfer funds on the same day to an account at another financial institution

fees.name: Stop payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged to stop payment of a cheque you have drawn or a bank cheque.

fees.name: Telegraphic transfer - Foreign Currency (Outgoing International Payment)
fees.additionalInfo: When transferring in a foreign currency. Fee is inclusive of $20.00 payable to the product issuer, Convera Australia Pty Ltd.

fees.name: Telegraphic transfer - Australian Currency (Outgoing International Payment)
fees.additionalInfo: When transferring in AUD. Fee is inclusive of $40.00 payable to the product issuer, Convera Australia Pty Ltd.

fees.name: Payment service creation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a customer requests we create an Easypay or Third Party Payment Service to other than a Greater Bank account.

fees.name: Establishment fee
fees.additionalInfo: 0.5% of amount borrowed or $600.00 whichever is greater*

fees.name: Administration fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we consent to any subdivision, lease, discharge, partial discharge, change of name, release of a Security, changing a policy of lenders mortgage insurance, creation of subsequent Security Interest or any dealing in relation to a Security.

fees.name: Conversion fee - Switch to a Basic/Great Rate or Ultimate Home Loan
fees.additionalInfo: $500 fee payable when you ask us to switch your loan to a Basic/Great Rate or Ultimate Home Loan. If more than one loan is being converted each additional loan converted at the same time will attract a reduced fee of $250.

fees.name: Conversion Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $350 to convert, for example between a variable to a fixed loan or between principal & interest to interest only. If more than one loan is being converted at the same time each additional loan converted will attract a reduced fee of $250.

fees.name: Default Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: In default by an amount that is less than 2 repayments $6.00, otherwise $20.00.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we send you a notice informing you of a default under this contract

fees.name: Discharge administration fee
fees.additionalInfo: A Discharge Administration fee is payable when you request us to close your loan account, or produce title deeds at settlement. If Greater Bank incurs any costs associated when doing this, the cost will also be passed on to you.

fees.name: Government charges
fees.additionalInfo: Charges will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. These charges include Withholding Tax, Registration Fees on security documents and Stamp Duty. For Contracts Regulated by the National Credit Code, the only fees and charges that are payable are those set out in that contract (as varied from time to time).

fees.name: Guarantee fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each guarantee provided

fees.name: Law stationers fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable for costs and disbursements we pay to our Law Stationers for providing information on a security or acting for us in connection with the Contract or a Security.

fees.name: Legal fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable when (or after) we make the amount of credit available to you for any costs and disbursements we have to pay a solicitor or conveyancer for acting for us in relation to this loan

fees.name: Mercantile agents fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable when we instruct a mercantile agent to contact you on our behalf in relation to this loan or a security.

fees.name: Mortgage Insurance Premium Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. The amount charged by our mortgage insurer for a lenders mortgage insurance policy.

fees.name: Registration fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable when we register any documents in relation to a security.

fees.name: Property Exchange Australia (PEXA) transaction fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. Payable when we have to register any documents in relation to a security using PEXA, request information using PEXA, or we process a financial settlement using PEXA. Fees are applied as charged by PEXA

fees.name: Settlement processing fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for costs we incur in arranging settlement of the loan

fees.name: Title insurance premium
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. The amount charged by our title insurer for a lenders title insurance policy.

fees.name: Valuation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee amount will be variable, calculated if and when applicable. The amount charged by our valuer when a valuation is required by us (other than a valuation obtained on application).

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Base rate disclosed. Margins will be applied.
